about_the_game:
Includes the Albert and Otto Original Soundtrack in MP3 format with music by Rob Frost, featuring a bonus track not heard in the game.

Track List:

1. Woodland Synth - 5:00
2. One for Sorrow Two for Joy - 6:30
3. Tin Man - 4:15
4. Blitz - 4:58
5. Dirty Gun (Bonus)- 4:41
6. Drowning - 3:54
7. Counting Dragons - 1:53
8. Old Rabbits Die Hard - 1:14
9. End Credits - 2:04

Songs will be placed in your Albert and Otto folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\AlbertandOtto\Soundtrack
